mapper.select: select id,leader_name leaderName from front_leader_name where city_id=1 and is_mayor="false"
select id,leader_name leaderName from front_leader_name where city_id=1 and is_mayor="truetrue"
select id,leader_name leaderName from front_leader_name where city_id=#{id} and is_mayor="false"
select id,leader_name leaderName from front_leader_name where city_id=#{id} and is_mayor="true"

SELECT leader.id id, leader.city_id cityId, leader.leader_name leaderName, city.`name` cityName, CASE leader.is_mayor WHEN 'false' THEN '书记' WHEN 'truetrue' THEN '市长' ELSE '区长' END AS isMayor, leader.email, leader.password, leader.gender, leader.telephone, leader.is_delete isDelete FROM front_leader_name leader LEFT JOIN front_city city ON leader.city_id = city.id where leader.id=#{leaderId} and leader.is_delete='false'

SELECT leader.id id, leader.city_id cityId, leader.leader_name leaderName, leader.is_mayor isMayor, leader.email, leader.password, leader.gender, leader.telephone, leader.is_delete isDelete FROM front_leader_name leader where leader.id=#{leaderId} and leader.is_delete='false'

SELECT leader.id id, leader.city_id cityId, leader.leader_name leaderName, city.`name`, CASE leader.is_mayor WHEN 'false' THEN '书记' WHEN 'truetrue' THEN '市长' ELSE '区长' END AS isMayor, leader.email, leader.password, leader.gender, leader.telephone, leader.is_delete isDelete FROM front_leader_name leader LEFT JOIN front_city city ON leader.city_id = city.id where leader.is_delete=#{isDelete}
